subject: Lockouts
Basketball
Television
lead_paragraph: ABC’s “Extreme Makeover: Home Edition,” wary of legal barriers, deleted scenes of Ray Allen’s visit to Springfield, Mass., to comfort a bereaved 8-year-old.
